title: Can anyone ID this font?
content:
Let me know please what font is this.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125231im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WhichTypeface_4005.jpg)
author: sasapetrova

comments.content:
Hello sasapetrova,

it should be Giza Seven Five by Font Bureau.

See it at [myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013125231/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/giza/sevenfive/)

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Design means: thinking comes first.
